code: import*as d3 from'd3';d3.json("../data/distritos_cr.json").then(data=>{console.log("Circle Packing Data:",data);const width=1000;const height=500;const pack=d3.pack().size([width,height]).padding(1.5);const root=d3.hierarchy(data).sum(d=>d.size).sort((a,b)=>b.value-a.value);console.log("Circle Packing Root:",root);const nodes=pack(root).descendants();const svg=d3.select("#circlePacking svg");const color=d3.scaleOrdinal(d3.schemeCategory10);const node=svg.selectAll("g").data(nodes).enter().append("g").attr("transform",d=>"translate(".concat(d.x,",").concat(d.y,")"));node.append("circle").attr("r",d=>d.r).attr("fill",d=>color(d.depth));node.append("text").attr("dy","0.3em").text(d=>d.data.name).attr("text-anchor","middle");}).catch(error=>console.error("Error loading Circle Packing Data:",error));
